movie.title: El cantante
movie.plot: The rise and fall of salsa singer, Héctor Lavoe (1946-1993), as told from the perspective of his wife Puchi, who looks back from 2002.

events.title: Héctor Lavoe moves to New York
Héctor Lavoe plays to a small audience at the Rubén Rodríguez Coliseum
Héctor Lavoe jumps from the ninth floor of the Condado Regency Hotel
